price: Hakukuwa ila ukelele mmoja tu; na mara walizimwa!
arabic: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ خَٰمِدُونَ
footnotes: Kuteketezwa kwao hakukuwa ila ni kwa ukelele mmoja tu tulio wapelekea. Na mara wao wakawa ni maiti, kama moto ulio zimwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum khāmidūna
